Thank you for choosing us!

Thank you for making your purchase at Volt! Now, you don’t have to worry about missing out on those special moments. You’ll receive an e-mail shortly with follow up instructions and your receipt.

Sharing is caring

Sharing is caring! Tired of your friends borrowing your chargers? If you share this link with your friends, they get 5% off their purchase! If five of your friends book Volt, you get your Volt Charger immediatly refunded ( 200,- kr ) and you get to keep it for free!
